title: Project Planet - Earth vs Humanity
notes: Steam shows Mixed: 66% of 12 reviews. SteamDB shows 64.63% positive; small sample keeps score mid‑60s.
raw_comment: Strategic party game for up to 6 players. 1 player, as planet earth, tries to wipe out the human race. Up to 5 players try to save humanity. Phones as controllers. Shared screen + phone screens.
